Master Entien:
You came because you got my message? So welcome! As you know, one of the burglars, who attacked our wagon, wants to tell his accomplices some information. Stop him!
According to the report, burglars disguised as a monsters and hiding in this area. I'll follow the escapees to the West and South. And you find those who fled to the East and North. The burglar who rushed to the East, dressed as Dead Seeker from Execution Grounds, and burglar who rushed to the North, dressed ad Marsh Atakato Drone from Cruma Marshands. Find them, kill them and then return.
